column5: I was going to go for some steel tomorrow on either the niagara whirlpool or port dalhousie.  Does anyone have any reports from these places in the last while?  Would the whirlpool be cleared up by now??  Also, does anyone know the site for niagara river fishing someone told me a while ago and I forgot.  Smed

Can't get on that board unless your a member....I was there today....fishing was slow...managed 1 fish in 3 hours.  Shore ice is still very high, water is clear adn free of ice....but the fishing was extremely slow.....barely even any seagulls in the sky....means lack of baitfish!
Thanks for the info guys,  Smed
